item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When You Turn On SOS on iPhone With Low Battery Percentage!
item.description: Introduction We all know how important it is to keep our phones charged and ready to go. But what happens when your phone runs out of battery and you need help? That’s where the SOS feature on iPhone comes in. In this blog post, we’ll explore what happens when you turn on SOS on iPhone with a low battery percentage. What is SOS on iPhone? SOS (or “Safety of Self”) is a feature on iPhone that allows you to quickly call emergency services with just a few taps.
